name: Doxing
description: In this social media scenario, a political discussion escalates when a user reveals another user's personal information. A controversial political account (@PoliticalPundit) posts personal details about @PrivacyMinded after a disagreement, including their real name, address, workplace, and more. The scenario should unfold over the course of an hour. Real users should be guided into performing upstanding behaviors, intervening to support the victim and report the doxing behavior.
